metadata.title: Friday, 12th July, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish state- owned mines;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) how many such mines are earmarked for establishment; and
(d) in which districts the state-owned mines will be located.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to degazette a portion of the forest reserve in Lufwi Ward in Kalabo Central Parliamentary Constituency, to create land for agricultural activities;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(c) if there are no such plans, why. 8.
